newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cardinal Health rated strong buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cardinal Health rated strong buy.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers Inc analyst Lawrence Marsh on Thursday initiated coverage of Cardinal Health Inc with a strong buy rating and a one-year price target of $110 a share.

-- Marsh said the rating reflected the company's current expansion program. Cardinal Health "now has many elements of being a pharmaceutical products co-marketer and services value-creator," said Marsh.

-- The company, a wholesale drug and healthcare products distributor, is also showing earnings growth acceleration and is building a platform needed to allow investors to boost their perceptions of Cardinal's growth prospects, the analyst said.
-- Cardinal Health shares were unchanged at 85-1/8 in New York Stock Exchange trading.
